android.inputmethodservice
Class IInputMethodWrapper

java.lang.Object
  android.os.Binder
      com.android.internal.view.IInputMethod.Stub
          android.inputmethodservice.IInputMethodWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBinder, IInterface, com.android.internal.os.HandlerCaller.Callback, IInputMethod
 class IInputMethodWrapper
extends IInputMethod.Stub
implements com.android.internal.os.HandlerCaller.Callback

Implements the internal IInputMethod interface to convert incoming calls on to it back to calls on the public InputMethod interface, scheduling them on the main thread of the process.
